I'm a software engineer based in Greenville, SC, with experience in management within the hospitality industry. I have worked on full-stack development using different programming languages. Additionally, I am bilingual in Mandarin and English, and I have experience in communicating within projects and groups. I have been a leader in teams during my time in hospitality, fulfilling multiple needs. I enjoy engaging in conversations with others and working together to accomplish the necessary goals.

    • Interests

    In addition to my programming expertise, I find great fulfillment in the art of crafting clay jewelry. Designing and fashioning my own clay earrings from concept to completion brings me immense joy. From meticulously sketching out the initial design to skillfully molding the clay, baking it to perfection, and adding the finishing touches, I immerse myself in a creative process that parallels the stages of programming. Just as I plan architectures and implement features in coding, I carefully shape the clay, refine its details, and conduct thorough testing. The satisfaction of witnessing my designs come to life, whether through elegant lines of code or beautifully crafted clay earrings, fuels my passion for both pursuits, allowing me to embrace my artistic sensibilities alongside my technical expertise.
